problem.markdown:
>>What is the correct question to the answer "42"?<< ( ) What is the square root of 1764? ( ) How far away in light years is the nearest Earth-like planet? ( ) In 1993, the newest president of the United States became the nth president. What is n? (x) What is the answer to life, the universe and everything? ( ) All of the above
[explanation] While all are technically correct, the most correct is the fourth question. See "The Hitch-Hiker's Guide to the Galaxy." [explanation]
problem.p: What is the correct question to the answer "42"?
